article.title: General Dynamics to Provide Wide Area Network Services
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Dynamics, C4 Systems Incorporated, San Antonio, Texas, was awarded an $82,935,215 cost-plus-award-fee contract to provide for the multi-level security information systems wide area network services. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Triangle Park, North Carolina, is the contracting activity.
